StSShapeShifter:FruitBasket.NAME: Fruit Basket
StSShapeShifter:FruitBasket.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random Fruit to your hand.

StSShapeShifter:PoisonIvy.NAME: Poison Ivy
StSShapeShifter:PoisonIvy.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! poison to all enemies. Grow !StSShapeShifter:Grow!.

StSShapeShifter:DeepWound.NAME: Deep Wound
StSShapeShifter:DeepWound.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Whenever the target attacks, they take !M! damage.

StSShapeShifter:ShiftingStrike.NAME: Shifting Strike
StSShapeShifter:ShiftingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If you changed forms this turn, this card costs 0.

StSShapeShifter:OakBlade.NAME: Oak Blade
StSShapeShifter:OakBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Return a random card from your Discard Pile to your hand. Shuffle Oak Blade back into your Draw Pile

StSShapeShifter:Guard.NAME: Guard
StSShapeShifter:Guard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Dexterity affects this card !M! times.

StSShapeShifter:Sapling.NAME: Sapling
StSShapeShifter:Sapling.DESCRIPTION: Swap this card with a card in your discard pile. Draw 1 card. Exhaust.

StSShapeShifter:MagicMushrooms.NAME: Magical Mushrooms
StSShapeShifter:MagicMushrooms.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. Randomize the cost of cards in your hand. Exhaust

StSShapeShifter:Flourish.NAME: Flourish
StSShapeShifter:Flourish.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. Reduce their costs by 1 this turn.

StSShapeShifter:SpiritOfTheEarth.NAME: Spirit of the Earth
StSShapeShifter:SpiritOfTheEarth.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a skill, Gain !M! block.

StSShapeShifter:Hunt.NAME: Hunt
StSShapeShifter:Hunt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Gain !M! energy next turn.

StSShapeShifter:LeapingSlash.NAME: Leaping Slash
StSShapeShifter:LeapingSlash.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have at least 2 Dexterity. Deal !D! Damage.

StSShapeShifter:OpportuneSwoop.NAME: Opportune Swoop
StSShapeShifter:OpportuneSwoop.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have at least 5 cards in you Draw Pile and Discard Pile. Deal !D! Damage.

StSShapeShifter:RestoreBalance.NAME: Restore Balance
StSShapeShifter:RestoreBalance.DESCRIPTION: Remove all non-boss-specific buffs an enemy.

StSShapeShifter:RitualOfTheElders.NAME: Ritual of the Elders
StSShapeShifter:RitualOfTheElders.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Dexterity and 1 Strength. Increase Max HP by !M!.

StSShapeShifter:RitualOfTheExtinct.NAME: Ritual of the Extinct
StSShapeShifter:RitualOfTheExtinct.DESCRIPTION: Deal Massive damage to an enemy. Decrease Max HP by !M!.

StSShapeShifter:Absorb.NAME: Absorb
StSShapeShifter:Absorb.DESCRIPTION: Copy a random buff from an enemy.

StSShapeShifter:Bonk.NAME: Bonk
StSShapeShifter:Bonk.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Enter a random form.

StSShapeShifter:ThrashAbout.NAME: Thrash About
StSShapeShifter:ThrashAbout.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies 3 times. Lose 1 energy next turn.

StSShapeShifter:CursedApple.NAME: Cursed Apple
StSShapeShifter:CursedApple.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Wither !StSShapeShifter:Wither!. If this card is withered to 0, add a random Curse into your deck and exhaust this card.

StSShapeShifter:MultiSpiritedStrike.NAME: Multi-Spirited Strike
StSShapeShifter:MultiSpiritedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Damage is equivalent to !M!X the number of unique forms played this combat.

StSShapeShifter:SkullBash.NAME: Skull Bash
StSShapeShifter:SkullBash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Damage is equivalent half of your current hp.

StSShapeShifter:ReplenishingNectar.NAME: Replenishing Nectar
StSShapeShifter:ReplenishingNectar.DESCRIPTION: Heal for !M!. Increase this heal by 1 permanently. Exhaust.

StSShapeShifter:Wildfire.NAME: Wildfire
StSShapeShifter:Wildfire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. Wither !StSShapeShifter:Wither!.

StSShapeShifter:Earthquake.NAME: Earthquake
StSShapeShifter:Earthquake.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. Wither !StSShapeShifter:Wither!.

StSShapeShifter:ForestFire.NAME: Forest Fire
StSShapeShifter:ForestFire.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Draw !M! cards. Upgrade your hand.

StSShapeShifter:Tornado.NAME: Tornado
StSShapeShifter:Tornado.DESCRIPTION: Swap your draw and discard piles. Retain. Exhaust.

StSShapeShifter:RockSlide.NAME: Rock Slide
StSShapeShifter:RockSlide.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! to all enemies. If this is the first time this card is played this turn, return it to your hand. Grow !StSShapeShifter:Grow!.

StSShapeShifter:IntimidatingAura.NAME: Intimidating Aura
StSShapeShifter:IntimidatingAura.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! block for each Attack card in your hand.

StSShapeShifter:Pounce.NAME: Pounce
StSShapeShifter:Pounce.DESCRIPTION: If your last card played was a form, apply !M! vulnerable. Deal !D! damage.

StSShapeShifter:BurrBomb.NAME: Burr Bomb
StSShapeShifter:BurrBomb.DESCRIPTION: Apply a Burr Bomb to an enemy. After 2 turns, it explodes, dealing !D! damage. Grow !StSShapeShifter:Grow!.

StSShapeShifter:Tortoise_Form.NAME: Tortoise Form
StSShapeShifter:Tortoise_Form.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Tortoise Form, Gain !B! Block. While in Tortoise Form, gain !M! Dexterity

StSShapeShifter:Lynx_Form.NAME: Lynx Form
StSShapeShifter:Lynx_Form.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Lynx Form, Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. While in Lynx Form, gain !M! Strength

StSShapeShifter:RatForm.NAME: Rat Form
StSShapeShifter:RatForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Rat Form, Gain 1 Dodge and lose 1 Dexterity. While in Rat Form, apply !M! Poison to a random enemy at the end of your turn.

StSShapeShifter:OwlForm.NAME: Owl Form
StSShapeShifter:OwlForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Owl Form, Discover a Power card. While in Owl Form, draw 1 additional card each turn.

StSShapeShifter:WaspSwarmForm.NAME: Wasp Swarm Form
StSShapeShifter:WaspSwarmForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Wasp Swarm Form, Apply X Weak to all enemies. While in Wasp Swarm Form, deal X damage to all enemies at the start of your turn.

StSShapeShifter:HummingbirdForm.NAME: Hummingbird Form
StSShapeShifter:HummingbirdForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Hummingbird Form, upgrade a random card in your hand. While in Hummingbird Form, your Grow cards Grow for !M! additional when played.

StSShapeShifter:EagleForm.NAME: Eagle Form
StSShapeShifter:EagleForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Eagle Form, Discover an attack card. While in Eagle Form, at the start of your turn, apply !M! vulnerable to enemies who intend to attack

StSShapeShifter:PhoenixForm.NAME: Phoenix Form
StSShapeShifter:PhoenixForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Phoenix Form, Remove all debuffs. While in Phoenix Form, If you receive fatal damage, heal for !M!0 Percent of your health instead of dying.

StSShapeShifter:PorcupineForm.NAME: Porcupine Form
StSShapeShifter:PorcupineForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Porcupine Form, Gain 1 Artifact. While in Porcupine Form, gain !M! thorns.

StSShapeShifter:EntForm.NAME: Ent Form
StSShapeShifter:EntForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Ent Form, Gain 4 Regen. While in Ent Form, gain Entangled at the start of your turn and gain !M! Dexterity at the end of your turn.

StSShapeShifter:DeerForm.NAME: Deer Form
StSShapeShifter:DeerForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Deer Form, Gain !M! Weak and Draw 1 card. While in Deer Form, add a random skill to your hand at the start of your turn.

StSShapeShifter:BearForm.NAME: Bear Form
StSShapeShifter:BearForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Bear Form, Gain !M! Shielding and 1 Dexterity. While in Bear Form, gain 2(3) Dexterity

StSShapeShifter:WolfForm.NAME: Wolf Form
StSShapeShifter:WolfForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Wolf Form, Gain !M! Strength. While in Wolf Form, your attacks heal you for !M!.

StSShapeShifter:DragonForm.NAME: Dragon Form
StSShapeShifter:DragonForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Dragon Form, Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to all enemies. While in Dragon Form, deal 6(8) to all enemies and gain 6(8) block. Lasts up to 3 turns. Exhaust

StSShapeShifter:LionForm.NAME: Lion Form
StSShapeShifter:LionForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Lion Form, double your strength. While in Lion Form, Apply !M! Deep Wound to all enemies. Lasts up to 3 turns. Exhaust

StSShapeShifter:MonkeyForm.NAME: Monkey Form
StSShapeShifter:MonkeyForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Monkey Form, add a Banana to your hand. While in Monkey Form, whenever you play a card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

StSShapeShifter:FoxForm.NAME: Fox Form
StSShapeShifter:FoxForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Fox Form, deal !D! to a random enemy. While in Fox Form, at the start of your turn, Dig for treasure, gaining gold and a small chance at gaining a relic. Lasts for up to 3 turns. Exhaust.

StSShapeShifter:SquirrelForm.NAME: Squirrel Form
StSShapeShifter:SquirrelForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Squirrel Form, add 2 Acorns to your hand. While in Squirrel Form, add an Acorn to your hand at the start of your turn.

StSShapeShifter:HydraForm.NAME: Hydra Form
StSShapeShifter:HydraForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Hydra Form, Gain !M! Vulnerable. While in Hydra Form, deal triple damage. Lasts up to 3 turns. Exhaust

StSShapeShifter:MammothForm.NAME: Mammoth Form
StSShapeShifter:MammothForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Mammoth, Gain !B! Block. While in Mammoth Form, whenever you receive damage, take !M! less damage. Lasts up to 3 turns. Exhaust

StSShapeShifter:Rest.NAME: Rest
StSShapeShifter:Rest.DESCRIPTION: Exit your form. You may not enter a new form this turn. Gain !B! Block.

StSShapeShifter:Sap_Burst.NAME: Sap Burst
StSShapeShifter:Sap_Burst.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, reduce a random enemy's strength by !M!.

StSShapeShifter:DiverseSpirit.NAME: Diverse Spirit
StSShapeShifter:DiverseSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a unique form this combat, gain 1 energy and draw 1 card.

StSShapeShifter:PowerShifter.NAME: Power Shifter
StSShapeShifter:PowerShifter.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a unique form this combat, gain !M! Strength

StSShapeShifter:Ensconce.NAME: Ensconce
StSShapeShifter:Ensconce.DESCRIPTION: If you haven't changed forms this turn, increase the value of your current form by !M!.

StSShapeShifter:Spring.NAME: Spring
StSShapeShifter:Spring.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Grow card, increase its Grow value by !M!.

StSShapeShifter:Summer.NAME: Summer
StSShapeShifter:Summer.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 less card each turn. Whenever you draw a Grow card, double its Grow value.

StSShapeShifter:Autumn.NAME: Autumn
StSShapeShifter:Autumn.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 additional cards each turn. Whenever you draw a Wither card, increase its Wither value by !M!.

StSShapeShifter:Winter.NAME: Winter
StSShapeShifter:Winter.DESCRIPTION: Your Wither cards cost 1 less. Whenever you draw a Wither Card, double its Wither value.

StSShapeShifter:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
StSShapeShifter:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

StSShapeShifter:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
StSShapeShifter:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
StSShapeShifter:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

StSShapeShifter:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
StSShapeShifter:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

StSShapeShifter:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.NAME: Special Strike
StSShapeShifter:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !StSShapeShifter:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

StSShapeShifter:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
StSShapeShifter:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !StSShapeShifter:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
